title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why teams should pause before trading away tons of assets for Kevin Durant as the Nets continue to field offers. He puts most of the blame on Baker Mayfield for his departure from the Browns and why the relationship fell apart. He also tells you which young NBA stars he would take over Kevin Durant. Plus, NBA Insider Ric Bucher joins the show to give the latest on Kyrie Irving potentially joining the Lakers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
